Class QuizServerDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.QuizServerDB

  • public class QuizServerDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Database connection class.

      • closeConn

        public void closeConn()
        Closes the connection to the database.

      • checkUser

        public boolean checkUser(java.lang.String id,
                         java.lang.String name)
        Checking if a user already exists in the database. Otherwise creates an entry of a new user in the database with the given paramaeters.
        Parameters:
        id - Facebook-id of the user.
        name - Facebook-name of the user.
        Returns:
        Returns true if there is a user or a new user is created, false if a problem occured.

      • getUserName

        Parameters:
        userId - Id of the user.
        Returns:

      • getAllQuizFromUser

        public java.lang.String getAllQuizFromUser(java.lang.String User_Id)
        Returns the id and names of all quiz created by the user specifed by the given id.
        Parameters:
        User_Id -
        Returns:
        Returns a JSON string of an array including all quiz created by the given user.

      • getQuizInfo

        public java.lang.String getQuizInfo(int quizId)

        Returns:
        Returns a JSON string of the quiz and its questions and answers.
